author: Igo Estrela
title: Brazil Senate approves an Open Skies agreement with the US that could lead to a surge in flights
text:
Brazil 's Senate on Wednesday approved an Open Skies agreement between Brazil and the United States that clears the way for a partnership between American Airlines and LATAM Airlines .
The treaty will be sent to President Michel Temer, who is expected to sign it into law. The agreement should lead to a surge in flights and open the way for U.S. approval of the proposed business alliance between American Airlines and LATAM Airlines, the two largest carriers in the region.
